Website or app doesn't work properly

Desktop

```

https://www.autodoc.sk/
https://www.autodoc24.ch/
https://www.autodoc24.ro/
```

### Issue:

When accessing the sites, a grey modal overlay covers the pages.
Sometimes, the overlays can easely be dismissed by clicking on them, but this isn't obvious, since there are no visible dialogs.
In other cases though, the pages are also frozen (no scrollbar).

### Screenshots:

Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:

* **AdGuard Cookie Notices filter**

### Problem rule:

`##.cookies-popup`

### Possible fix:

`auto-doc.*,autodoc.*,autodoc24.*##.overlay`
`auto-doc.*,autodoc.*,autodoc24.*#$#body { overflow: auto !important; }`

### Other problem filters:

* **EasyList - Cookie Notices** https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/17977/
`##.cookies-popup`

* **I don't care about cookies** _(NOTIFIED)_
`~mercedes-benz.cr,~effector.pl,~autoersatzteile.de,~autoteiledirekt.de,~nike.com##.cookies-popup:not(body):not(html):not(.open)`
`~autoersatzteile.de,~autoteiledirekt.de##.popup--cookies`

--

### System info:

* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v120.0.1-1 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.54.1b0

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
